data.prayer: Father, help the 12,115 believers in Cayenne to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 200,885 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cayenne, French Guiana
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Cayenne, French Guiana.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Cayenne prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 12,115 believers in the state of Cayenne the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Hmong Njua people. 0.2% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Cayenne, French Guiana.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Cayenne you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Cayenne to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

location.name: Cayenne
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Lebanese, Han Chinese, Hakka, Wayampi, Amapari
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, Lebanese (1,500), Han Chinese, Hakka (15,000), Wayampi, Amapari (800)
